EmailTemplate.description: For internal use use only to notify users of applications awaiting approval.
EmailTemplate.name: Internal Application Approval Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New application for review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An application for {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c} has been checked and is ready for you to review.
1. Click on the link below to login to the Student Information System and view the application:
{!Student_Programme__c.Link}
2. When you have reviewed the application, click on the Approve/Reject link in the Approval History section.
3. To offer the applicant a place on the programme, please record your decision in the comments box and click the approve button.
4. If you require further information before a decision can be made, of if you decide to reject the applicant, please record your decision in the comments box and click the approve button.
